text.title: De nauigatione libri tres : quibus mathematicae disciplinae explicantur / ab Iacobo à Saa ... nuper in lucem editi.

bibliography.title: De nauigatione libri tres : quibus mathematicae disciplinae explicantur / ab Iacobo à Saa ... nuper in lucem editi.
bibliography.note: Publisher note: Parisijs : Ex officina Reginaldi Calderij, & Claudij eius filij, 1549.

Manuscript annotation on title page: Joannes : Deeus: 1552 : . MS annotations, underlinings and marginal nota in the hand of Dee, and a pencil doodle on the verso of leaf 106 of a breastplate with Dee's hieroglyphical monad (see Sherman, John Dee: The politics of reading and writing in the English renaissance, p. 88). Previous shelfmark: Cc.11.45 UkCU Volvelles on leaf 98 v and 103 v both intact. UkCU
